dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1896 IS: To modify the provision of law on expedited review of export licenses for exports of advanced technologies to Australia, the United Kingdom, and Canada.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cornyn (for himself and Mr. Coons) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To modify the provision of law on expedited review of export licenses for exports of advanced technologies to Australia, the United Kingdom, and Canada.

section.header: Modification of expedited review of export licenses for exports of advanced technologies to Australia, the United Kingdom, and Canada
section.text: Section 1344 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 (22 U.S.C. 10423) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: In this section, the term export includes, and applies with respect to, all transfers of defense articles and defense services described in subsection (a), including reexports, retransfers, third party transfers, temporary imports, and brokering activities of such articles and services.
